chapters.title: Mysterious Notes
chapters.content:
Natsuki found the first note in her locker: "Your smile brightens even the cloudiest days." She looked around but saw no one who might have left it.

Over the following weeks, more notes appeared in unexpected places, always with sweet and thoughtful messages. Natsuki began to wonder who her secret admirer could be.

Her friend Yuki suggested it might be Hiroshi, the quiet boy who always seemed to be nearby but never spoke to her directly.

"Maybe it's someone who's too shy to speak directly," Natsuki mused, keeping the latest note in her pocket.

chapters.title: Unveiled Heart
chapters.content:
Determined to discover her admirer's identity, Natsuki set a trap. She wrote a note asking the sender to meet her at the school fountain after classes.

To her surprise, it wasn't Hiroshi but Takeshi, the new student who had been in her literature class. He approached nervously, holding a small bouquet of cherry blossoms.

"I've been too afraid to speak to you in person," Takeshi admitted. "Words seemed safer than risking rejection."

"Sometimes the safest path isn't the most rewarding one," Natsuki replied, accepting the flowers. "I've been hoping you'd find the courage."

Their love story had begun with words on paper but would be written together in person.
